rows.label: qev040802_MSG0001
rows.name: I-is that...[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0002
rows.name:
Muimui not sure what coincidence bring friend here,
but...timing is perfect...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0003
rows.name:
Please... Food... Muimui take anything...
Just stick it in mouth of Muimui...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Meh-meh! This puny thing not fill belly of Muimui!
Cruel friend is mocking Muimui.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ooo... Muimui want at least five cosse beans and
three fullbelly geckos. Friend will find them, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ugh! That was foulest bread Muimui ever taste.
But at least now Muimui have energy to move hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0007
rows.name:
While friend is off getting cosse beans and fullbelly
geckos, Muimui will dig up Sword of Legendaryness
buried here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0008
rows.name:
But please hurry with food. If cash reward would help,
friend can have as much as [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] likes once Muimui
finds sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0009
rows.name:
*sniff* *sniff* Mmm... Something smell great.
Did friend bring food?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0011
rows.name: Ahhh! Friend is BEST friend! IT FOOOOOD![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0012
rows.name: Muimui give appropriate thanks for meal aaaand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0013
rows.name:
*HOMPHGROMNOMBLEOMNOMHARGLEBNARMOM*
*gulp*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0014
rows.name: Ahhhh. Muimui finally full.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Friend saved life of Muimui. Because when Legen-dar
started acting crazy earlier, Muimui got so excited he
forget to eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040802_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Muimui if he located the legendary item.

rows.label: qev040802_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev040802_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Muimui that Moimoi was worried about him.

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0016
rows.name:
Muimui DID find it! Er, well, to be honest,
Muimui find A legendary item. ...But not sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0017
rows.name:
Muimui found Earwax-Remover of Legendaryness!
Apparently it was owned by same ancestor as sword,
so signature was identical.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0018
rows.name:
Hmm. Now Muimui feel bad. Maybe this handful of
leftover cosse beans can be souvenir for Moimoi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh, and also this Earwax-Remover of Legendaryness
that Muimui dug up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0020
rows.name:
Apparently it was owned by same ancestor as sword,
so Legen-dar signature was identical.
Basically worthless, but oh well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0021
rows.name:
This time ended in failure again, but at least Muimui
not going home empty-handed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0022
rows.name:
Now that this response is ruled out,
Legen-dar is picking up new response in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0023
rows.name: That one MUST be the Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0024
rows.name:
...But back home for now. Muimui needs to show
Moimoi that his brotherpon is not dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0025
rows.name:
Hearing of Muimui is clearer than ever after just one
round with Earwax-Remover of Legendaryness!
Muimui certainly sees where stories come from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040802_MSG0026
rows.name:
Now armed with Legen-dar AND ultra-keen hearing,
Muimui is sure to find Sword of Legendaryness over
in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]
